title: Rename Pipeline page header to "Pipeline"

requirements.text: Update the Pipeline page header title to display "Pipeline" instead of "Pipeline de Vendas" (header only). This should affect the <h1> title rendered in the Pipeline page header and not change navigation labels, browser tab title, or any other locations.

quotes: muda o nome da página para apenas pipeline ao inves de pipeline de vendas?

acceptanceCriteria: When visiting the internal Pipeline page, the header <h1> displays exactly: "Pipeline".
The Pipeline page description text remains unchanged.
No other UI labels (e.g., sidebar/nav items) are changed as part of this update.
No changes are made to the browser tab title as part of this update.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the change limited to the Pipeline page header text only.
nonGoals: Renaming the Pipeline label in the sidebar/mobile navigation.
Changing any backend behavior or stored data.
